WHYME.DESCRIPTION: What I find so fascinating about programming, just as it is in my current craft, is that you have to develop solutions to achieve a result. You can really express your creativity here.

MYSKILLS.INFOTEXT: I continuously expand my skillset and enjoy developing modern, scalable applications. I stay up-to-date with new technologies, best practices, and current development trends.

Tab1.CONTENT_INTRO: A task management tool inspired by the Kanban system. Create, assign, prioritize and move tasks via drag & drop — including user and category assignment.
Tab1.CONTENT_APPROACH: Modular architecture with clear separation of UI components, services, and Firebase integration. Consistent naming conventions and in-code documentation with JSDoc. Code formatting and quality were ensured using Prettier and Git version control.
Tab1.CONTENT_LEARNINGS: Our project team consisted of four people. My main responsibilities included developing the task components and data handling logic. Technologies used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Firebase. Collaboration was structured, highly productive, and enjoyable.

Tab1.CONTENT_INTRO: Learning and applying object-oriented programming (OOP) within an interactive browser game.
Tab1.CONTENT_APPROACH: Code organized into reusable modules (HTML layout, CSS styling, canvas rendering, game logic). Clean architecture, consistent naming, documentation with JSDoc, meaningful commits via Git. Focus on maintainability and clarity.
Tab1.CONTENT_LEARNINGS: This project significantly strengthened my JavaScript and canvas skills. Working with animations, collision detection and object-oriented design was highly instructive and rewarding.

Tab1.CONTENT_INTRO: Fetching data from a Pokémon API using JavaScript, processing JSON responses and rendering dynamic UI elements.
Tab1.CONTENT_APPROACH: Structured HTML and CSS layout first, followed by modular JavaScript architecture. Integrated API calls and dynamically generated visual elements based on live fetched data.
Tab1.CONTENT_LEARNINGS: I strengthened my ability to consume external APIs and generate dynamic UI content. The project improved my understanding of async data handling and responsive rendering.

TEAMPLAYER.HEADLINE_SUB: Here’s what my colleagues say about working with me

PLAYER.DESCRIPTION: "Christian was a tremendous asset to our team. He is extremely helpful, always patient and highly reliable. His structured approach consistently moved the project forward — truly someone who makes collaboration enjoyable and productive."

"Christian demonstrated outstanding commitment and technical expertise. He works independently, contributes valuable ideas, and communicates clearly. His positive and humorous attitude fostered a highly pleasant and motivating team atmosphere."

"I had the pleasure of working with Christian on a web development project. His technical knowledge, structured thinking, and solution-driven approach were impressive. His professional communication and team mindset made the project efficient and successful. Highly recommended!"

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Get in touch
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to contact me if you have a job opportunity or a project where my expertise as a master electrician and developer could add value. I’m especially passionate about IoT, embedded systems, smart home solutions, and modern web development (Angular, SCSS, Firebase).
CONTACT.PRIVACYPOLICY_NOTICE_SUFFIX: and agree to the processing of my data.

SECTIONS.TITLE: Controller
CONTENT: • Ensuring website functionality and security
No tracking cookies are used. LocalStorage is applied exclusively for essential functions (language selection, scroll position).
Right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, data portability, objection and withdrawal.
